text: Bottle at home... Light golden... Thin white lacing... Soft floral zezty orange passion fruit nose... Light dry bitter zezty fruits. Light peppery fruits front..
How : bottle Appearance : clear light golden with a small white head. Aroma : tropical fruits, citrus peel, grass, candied orange and some pine. Palate : medium to light body, average carbonation.
Bottle @ home, enjoyed in the garden. Light hazy golden pour with a frothy head. Notes of juicy hops, mangoes, grape fruit, citrus peel and a light bitterness.
Flaska från SB. Ljust bärnstensfärgad med smutsvitt skum. Fruktig och fräsch doft med ananas och passionfrukt. Lättdrucken med trevlig fruktighet och balanserad beska.

Riktigt bra session ipa, sjukt god verkligen! Välhumlad med en bra doft av citrus och tropiska frukter. Smaken är väldigt fruktig med en passande beska, den är relativt mild. Mycket bra!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

330ml bottle from Systembolaget. Pours light yellow with quite large white head. Medium carbonation. Aroma of citrus, tropical fruits, bit grassy. Taste is citrus, pine, tropical fruits (thought of mango and passionfruit, not sure though), and a low grassy bitter finish. Really enjoyable session IPA, above average. Will probably drink more times!

UPDATED: APR 4, 2016 Pours cloudy medium amber with a white head. Aroma; Citra hops, mango, passionfruit, some grass, pine and orange peels. Taste; Mango, tangerine, citrus, passionfruit, minerals and pine with a medium bitter finish..It?s a ok IPA, but needs to be a little creamier to hit the next level of beer greatness..

Bottle shared by VsXsV during the Hyatt lobby fart share on Tuesday night. Thanks again, Viktor! Pours a cloudy light gold color with a small white head that settles into a ring. Bright florals, with lemon, bready malts, hay, and tea. Light-bodied, with moderate carbonationa and a smooth tea-like mouthfeel. Really nice, simple, drinkable session IPA.

Pours clear amber minimal head
Aromas of tropical fruits, resin, pine
Taste has malty bread, tropical fruits, caramel

Pours semi clear orange with a low white head. Aromas of passion fruit, peach, apricot, citrus, kiwi. Very fruity! Taste is very fruity and sunny with very low bitterness. Mouthfeel is medium bodied with medium carbonation.

At a tasting, many thanks rlgk, small stable bubbly head, very cloudy lightish orange color, aroma of pomello, grapefruit peel, herbs, wood and a hint of spice, medium empathic shrubby, grapefruit bitterness that is quite mellow, light bready naltines and some wood, bready lemony aftertaste. Very good.

UPDATED: FEB 15, 2016 Re-rate 2/16: Bottle sample at a tasting at troubless place. Thanks tomer. Lovely fruity hops. Dry, bitter. 8/3/7/3/15=3.6

[1/30/16] Bottle sample at the Encomium bottle share, after RateBeer Best awards ceremony at Hyatt Vineyard Creek Hotel in Santa Rosa. Thanks everyone who shared bottles! Hazy golden. Fruity hops, dry, juicy. Very nice. 7/3/8/3/15=3.6

Bottle shared. Very lightly hazy deep gold pour with no head. Aroma is fruity, lots of tropical fruits, juicy hop. Taste is fruity, pineapple, tropical notes. Palate is light, nice carbonation. Good stuff!

330ml bottle. Semi-hazy golden with minimal white head. Aroma of tropical fruits, mango, pineapple, passion fruit, orange and citrus. Taste is quite bitter with citrus, grapefruit and orange peel in the foreground followed by some of the fruitiness of the aroma and rounded off by crackers, crisp bread and slight white toast from the malts. Light, refreshing mouthfeel, low but prickly carbonation and light bitter fruity aftertaste.
Bottle - NIce light lemon forwarward citrus notes. Clear pale gold with a small white head. Light citrus and mellow bitterness. Light and refreshing.

Bottle shared during RBWG 2016 - many thanks to Viktor. Pours clear gold with a frothy white head. The nose has nice and fresh pithy citrus, lemon, tangerine. Light sweet flavor with dry pale bread, pithy grapefruit, tangerine, light bitter straw. Light bodied with average carbonation. Dry and pithy on the finish, with some minerals, nectarine, grapefruit. Nice and drinkable.

Bottle at RBWG 2016. Thanks Viktor. Super citrus and herbal nose. Lightly earthy. Lightly hazy orange. Small white head. Taste is mostly citrus with some rind bitterness. Nice but would like more hop flavor.

Bottle split in the hotel lobby, RBWG 16, thanks to Fergus name Withheld, 02/02/16.
Very lightly hazed golden blonde with a moderate off White covering. 
Nose is orange pith, light pine, straw, melon, tangerine. 
Taste comprises orange pith, straw, tangy citrics, light pine, toasted malt.
Medium bodied, fine carbonation, semi drying close. 
Decent enough SIPA.
user_location: Hazlemere, the lower Xhitlerns, Buckinghamshire, ENGLAND

text:
Bottle from Systembolaget, e-order in January 2016. 

Hazy orange with a white head. Fresh aroma of hops, mango, passionfruit and some pineapple. Similar taste. The body was on the light side and the finish bitter. A tasty and refreshing "summer beer".
330 ml bottle from Systembolaget. Hazy golden with white head. Fruity, floral with citrus and pineapple. Semi dry with medium bitterness and medium carbonation. Nice!
Bottle. Pours a hazy orange with small white head. The aroma is tropical fruit and dank. Thin mouth, juicy citrus, dank, light bitterness, very good.

Bottle 330ml. [ As All In Brewing SOMA ].Clear medium orange yellow color with a average, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, off-white head. Aroma is moderate malty, pale malt, caramel, fruity malt, moderate hoppy, orange - citrus, dried fruit. Flavor is moderate sweet and bitter with a long duration, citrus - orange, dried fruit, fruity malt, sweet malt. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft. [20160109]
A: Orange coloured with a fast disappearing white head. N: Pine, forrest, grapefruit T: Heavy pine taste, hint of grapefruit, hazelnut, zest O: Lovely pine IPA!
Bärnstensfärgad klar med vit skum. Mycket tropisk doft och smak mest annanas med ok beska. Bra session ipa

UPDATED: FEB 3, 2016 Keg at brewers beer bar Gothenburg. Translucent golden orange coloured pour with a sticky white head. Aroma is zesty citrus and orange rind, honey. Flavour is composed if light grains, zesty, lemon and orange rind, grainy,little alcohol, apricot, tangy. Palate is semi sweet and frothy in the mouth, light Hoo resin. Good flavour forward session.

Tasting @ Stefan 160122. Bootle (330 ml) from Systembolaget. Tropical fruity and hoppy with citrusy notes, grapefruits, mango and pine needles, light body with a watery texture. The finish is dry, hoppy and fruity.
Beer tasting @ Stefan 22/1-16. Bottle from Systembolaget. Hoppy and fruity with grapefruit and tropical fruits. Body is medium, the finish is dry, fruity and hoppy.

Flaska från SB. Lokala sortimentet. Fruktig doft med passionsfrukt, ananas, papaya, grape och mango. Rejäla smaker, bra balans, fruktig, kådig, lite strävt klorofyllig och relativt besk. Någonstans mellan fruktigt elegant och rå och obortstad. Men hur som helst riktigt bra.

Mycket trevlig öl.
Trevlig färg med god doft och smak; Frisk citrussmak. Låg alkoholhalt, men ändå mycket smak.
Bottle. Frothy White good mostly deminishing head. Yellow colour. Light malty and moderate hoppy aroma. Modetrate bitter flavor. Grape fruit notes. Average moderate bitter finish. Oily palate.
Bottle @ my place. Nice head with good duration. Color is golden. Aroma and taste are rich hops, flowers, fruits, grass, malt, pine, citrus and has a nice bitter finish.

Bottle, 4.7%. Clear golden with small off-white head. Aroma is malt, caramel, toasted, hops and a little citrus. Flavour is malt, caramel, hops, spicy, little grapefruit, little sweet and medium bitter.
Bottle @ Saxo tasting. Clear golden with a white head. Aroma is sweet, malty and moderate hoppy - fruity. Flavor is medium sweet and moderate bitter. Dry and moderate bitter finish. 090116

Bottle from Systembolaget. Clear golden with white head. Huge tropical fruit aroma with mango, papaya and citrus. A flavor bomb including mango, citrus and sweet malt. Very well balanced and very hoppy.

Bottle: a bitt hazy yellow colour thin White head, Aroma is dominated of a dry fruity, citrus, orange, dusty, cellar.. Flavor: had a bomb of fruits and citrus,, a bit of sweet maltynes, citrus oand flowery is dominated here. Nice to be a so low alcy. Thin body long fruity citrus finish. Nice !

Halvljus och lättgrumlig. Bra fruktig doft och smaken överraskar med stort djup och trevlig bredd. Smakar större än vad alkoholen anger, stiligt 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle from SB. Drank it at home. 18/12-15.
App: Grumlig med en honungsgyllene orange färg och ett två fingrar smutsvitt bubbligt skum.
Aroma: Fräscht humlig doft med diverse citrusfrukter som grapefrukt, lime och mandarin mer tropiska drag av stjärnfrukt och passionsfrukt. Lättsam marmeladig sötma och beska av grapefruktskal. Fräscht!
Taste: liknande friska syrliga citrusmix med passionsfrukt. Rätt så torr med en markerad men snygg moorish citrusskalbeska. Malten är i bakgrunden med endast lite drag av vetekex.
Palate: Mjuk medelstor munkänsla med mjuk kolsyra. Lätt oljig.
Overall: Riktigt fräsch och snygg humlekoncentrerad öl.

Bottled, from Systembolaget.  Hazy deep golden, mid sized head. Generous passsionfruit and lychee aroma. Dryish with light body and clean, rounded mouthfeel. Sweaty passionfruit and citrus lingers. Long but non assaulting grapestone bitterness. Elegant and likable

Draught at The Rover on December 8, 2015.Hazy golden color, big lasting off-white head. Nice little hat on top, though bubbly underneath. Bitter, pith, citrus taste, fresh but too bitter and unbalanced. Caramel, pith, citrus marmalade aftertaste. Medium to a bit fizzy mouthfeel, high bitterness. Citrus, floral, green, resin scent.
330 ml bottle. Hazy golden with beige head. Aroma is very hoppy, fruity, peach, citrus and tropical fruits. Taste is fruity, nicely balanced, marked bitter and lots of fruity hops. Nice!

Bottled from Systembolaget
Golden with a white head. 
Piney citrus in the aroma with passionfruits. 
Rather high carbonation. 
Resinous flavour with tropical fruits. 
Medium to high bitterness.

Hoppy, very fruity, grapefruit, pineapple, citric, resinous.
Amber colour, medium white head, lacing.
Lots of blackcurrants in the big bite, mid- sweet, immensely flavourful considering ABV, but the feels a tad out of whack.
Medium body, soft carbonation, bitter, resinous finish.

330ml bottle from Systembolaget. Hazy golden with lively small bubbles in the glass. White average size head that leaves some lacing on the glass. Very hoppy and fruity aroma, peach, ripe orange, lychee. Well rounded and juicy mouthfeel. Fruity and hoppy taste peach, pineapple, mango, bitter citrus peel and sweet tangerines. Very fresh!

A huge, three finger high, white head and a little bit hazy, yellow beer - Looks fresh and drinkable! 

Nose: Mango, orange, peach, pineapple, grass, pine - a lot of hops! 
Taste: Sweet malt. Orange, peach, pine and citrus. 
Mouth: Medium to light body. Medium carbonation. A nice, dry bitterness stays on the tounge at the end. 

A very good, easy-drinking and fresh session IPA from All In Brewing.

December 3, 2015. Bottle at home, best before november 5, 2016. 
Hazy orange with a large frothy and quickly dissipating white head. Aroma is fruity with while peach, passion fruit, pineapple, pine, grass, grain and dank hoppy notes. Taste is light sweet and soft medium bitterness. Finish is light to medium sweet fruity with peach, mango, some grapefruit notes, soft medium bitterness with grass and hints of pine. Light to medium bodied, slight oily texture, soft to average carbonation.
Great session IPA!
Bottle @ Haket Pub. Cloudy yellow with a small white head. Hoppy and fruity tones. Fruit, malt and hops. Medium to ligth body with a nice bitter sweet finish.

Appearance: Hazy golden color with a fine off white head. Good lacing.Aroma: Pine, fruity and citrus hoppy.Palate: Medium body. Moderate sweet and a fine bitterness. Average to soft carbonation. Semi dry texture.Taste: Mild tropical, pine and fresh citrus hoppy.Overall impression: Lovely tasty and easy drinkable stuff.Personal stats: On tap at All In Brewing Festival in Gothenburg, Sweden - 2015

Draught at All In Beer Fest 2015. Clear golden, medium white head. Intense tropical fruit hop aroma, some bready malt in the background. Light to medium bodied, medium carbonation. Dry with medium bitterness.

All In Beerfest 2015: Aroma is fruity and sweet peachy with lighter bread notes. Taste is fresh hops, quite solid malt body for a session and mango with tangerines. Light bitterness. High drinkability.

Draught at All In Beer Fest 2015. Clear golden liquid with medium white head. Aroma of citrus, grapefruit, tangerine, mango, light bread and fresh hops. Taste is dry and light to medium bitter with notes of citrus, tangerine, light bread and fresh hops. Light to medium bodied with medium carbonation. Super nice!

Draft @ Malmö Brewing Craft Beer Festival 2015. Pours a hazy golden pale orange color with a small white head. Has a fruity peachy hoppy aroma. Fruity malty peachy hoppy bitter flavor. Has a fruity malty peachy hoppy finish.
On tap at All In Beer Fest. Hoppy smell with citrus and peach. Similar taste. Refreshing. Nice hop aroma and bitterness. Summer beer.

Draught at Taproom.
Hazy golden coloured with a medium sized white head.
Fruity aroma of hops and pine needles with notes of citrus.
Fruity flavour of hops and pine needles with notes of citrus and grapefruits.
Dry hoppy finish.

33 cl bottle. Pours hazy yellow, huge white head. Aroma is mild hebal, crisp fruity, citrusy and grapefruity, mango. Smooth fruty. Crisp hoppy, peqchy and mango. Lingering fruity and crisp hoppy finish.

Aroma and taste is a mix of tropical and citrus fruits, medium pale malts, some light caramel, tangerine, peachy, lemon, refreshing, hoppy bitter finish. Solid quaffing number.

Draught at Haket, Göteborg. Clear golden beer with a nice offwhite head. Fresh hoppy pine aroma, peach, grapes, caramel, pine apples, some mango. Hoppy pine flavor, earthy, pine apples, mango, cedar notes, hay, peach, hay, spicy herbal notes. Great SIPA with attitude.

Draught at Haket cons 2015-10-10 Göteborg new Swe brewery ;)
AR: troipical marmalade, wee dusty
AP: hazy amber, frothy deminshing white foam
F: fizzy, tropical marmalade, soapy, wee bready,

UPDATED: OCT 19, 2015 Draught @ Haket. Pours hazy tiny burnt yellow with a big frothy that leaves some sparse thick lacing on the glass while dissipating. Smell is fruity and grassy with crackers, grapefruit juice, passion fruit, lychee, freshly cut grass, pine needles and lemon zest. Taste is slightly bitter, fruity and grassy. Mouthfeel is soft, dry, tiny astringent and light to medium bodied. Finish is bitter with crackers, white bread, grapefruit juice, pineapple, mango, passion fruit, star fruit, green grapes, freshly cut grass, pine needles, chives and lemon zest. Might need a week to mellow out but this is just up my alley SIPA-wise.
